publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1402 Ross Finnie: The Farm Business Development (Scotland) Amendment Scheme 2004 (SSI 2004/236)-That the Environment and Rural Development Committee recommends that the Farm Business Development (Scotland) Amendment Scheme 2004 (SSI 2004/236) be approved. Supported by: Allan Wilson*

S2M-1402 Ross Finnie: The Farm Business Development (Scotland) Amendment Scheme 2004 (SSI 2004/236)-That the Environment and Rural Development Committee recommends that the Farm Business Development (Scotland) Amendment Scheme 2004 (SSI 2004/236) be approved. Supported by: Allan Wilson
